## tap() function

This method invokes interceptor and returns a value. The interceptor is invoked with one argument.

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare function tap<T, U>(
  f: (arg: Awaited<T>) => U,
  v: T,
): U extends Promise<any> ? Promise<Awaited<T>> : T;
```

## Example

```ts
tap(console.log, [1, 2, 3, 4, 5]);
// log [1, 2, 3, 4, 5]
// return [1, 2, 3, 4, 5]

tap(async (a) => console.log(a), [1, 2, 3, 4, 5]);
// log [1, 2, 3, 4, 5]
// return Promise<[1, 2, 3, 4, 5]>
```

[Open Source Code](https://github.com/marpple/FxTS/blob/main/src/tap.ts)
